document.heading: Real Property Tax Classifications Act for Tax Year 1980

history.narrative: Law 3-37, the “Real Property Tax Classifications Act for Tax Year 1980,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-141, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 31, 1979 and September 11, 1979, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on September 28, 1979, it was assigned Act No. 3-104 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
